channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ope! Madison Mallards unveil another alternate
item.description: There are a lot of theories about the origins of the quirky exclamation “Ope!”—none of which stand up to any real scrutiny. More onomatopoeia than actual word, the term has been likened to “oops” or “oh” plus the letter P, and associated with most anywhere human beings have made inadvertent

item.title: Alfred Molina Chokes Up Talking About Dad Who Rebuffed His Acting Dream
item.description: Here's your tearjerker moment of the week -- Alfred Molina is talking about his dad, who didn't approve of him being an actor ... even though he kept tabs on his boy in private. The veteran thespian sat down for an interview with Vanity Fair, and…

item.title: Tri-City Chili Peppers to play “Cosmic Baseball” under black lights
item.description: Nearly a century after the Negro Leagues’ Kansas City Monarchs became the first professional baseball team to host a baseball game under artificial lights, the Coastal Plain League’s Tri-City Chili Peppers are putting their own spin on that innovation. The team will play “Cosmic Baseball” under powerful black lights that

item.title: Elisabeth Moss Says 'Girl, Interrupted' Split Cast, Angelina vs. Winona
item.description: Elisabeth Moss says filming "Girl, Interrupted" was more like a real-life "Mean Girls," as the set split into 2 camps ... with Angelina Jolie and Winona Ryder each calling shots. The two-time Golden Globe winner -- who played Polly in the 1999…

item.title: Rockford Rivets to rebrand as Screw City Sock Monkeys
item.description: The collegiate summer level Rockford Rivets will pay tribute to their hometown’s textile and manufacturing heritage when they take to the field as the Screw City Sock Monkeys for two games this season. The Sock Monkeys nickname derives from Rockford, Illinois’s claim to “Home of the Sock Monkey”—a term the

item.title: Big Boy Says Drake is Primed to Respond to Kendrick Lamar's Latest Diss
item.description: Big Boy says he's heard through the grapevine that Drake is geared up to respond to Kendrick Lamar (again) after the latter's latest harsh diss ... and the DJ loves it! The legendary Real 92.3 radio host hopped on "TMZ Live" Wednesday to give his…

item.title: First Look at the 2024 World Series and MLB Postseason Logos
item.description: It might still be the beginning of May, but today, we’re looking forward all the way to October with the release of Major League Baseball’s 2024 Postseason Logos. First, let’s take a look at the whole package: Yes, they do feel awfully similar to last season. However, there are some

item.title: Canelo Alvarez Rips 'F***ing Asshole," "P****" Oscar De La Hoya
item.description: Canelo Alvarez is fighting on Saturday, but perhaps an opponent change is in order ... 'cause Saul went scorched earth on Oscar De La Hoya, as the legendary fighter sat just feet away. "He's a f***ing asshole. That's what I say. He's a f***ing…

item.title: Wyoming Cowboys Unveil New Gold Alternate Football Jerseys
item.description: Wyoming recently unveiled new gold alternate jerseys that put the state and one of its most notable geographical features at the forefront of the design.

item.title: Sammy Hagar Surprised By Chad Smith At Hollywood Walk of Fame Ceremony
item.description: Sammy Hagar received one spicy surprise during his Hollywood Walk of Fame ceremony this week ... 'cause his 'Red Hot' buddy Chad Smith showed his love in person. Sources with direct knowledge tell TMZ ... Smith -- the longtime drummer for the Red…
